trends: There has been one other sighting in Island Lake
There were no other sightings in Island Lake on or around April 24th 1987
divs: Sighting Detailssaw four laser like lights. Looking into the northern night sky saw four laser like lights instantly appear going east to west. Lights were in two enemy spaced pairs with a larger space between the two pairs. No object was noted the lines were simply there vivid red then faded away.
